sentences.en: A detached retina is more serious.
sentences.cn: 视网膜剥离就更严重了.

sentences.en: A tiny electronic pad is placed onto the retina of one eye, so that the electrodes are in direct contact with the ganglion cells.
sentences.cn: 一个微小的电子衬垫被放置在单侧眼睛的视网膜上，这样电极就可以与神经节细胞直接接触了。

sentences.en: Consider one of the difficulties: every time we move our eyes, the image on our retina moves.
sentences.cn: 比如困难之一就是：每当我们的眼球移动时，视网膜上的影像也在移动。

sentences.en: If a person is short - sighted, images are focused in front of their retina.
sentences.cn: 人如果近视的话, 图像就会聚焦在视网膜前方.

sentences.en: In the periphery of the retina, ganglion cells are relatively few in number.
sentences.cn: 在视网膜的边缘区节细胞相当少.

sentences.en: Rays light impinge upon the retina.
Researchers examined how the retina responds to different black - and - white contrast situations.
sentences.cn: 研究人员测试了视网膜对不同的 黑白 混合反差对比环境的反应.

sentences.en: Sight is made possible by rays of light impinging on the retina.
sentences.cn: 由于光线射到视网膜上,眼睛才看得见.

sentences.en: The choroid coat carries many blood vessels to supply the retina.
sentences.cn: 脉络膜通过许多血管为视网膜供应血液.

sentences.en: The optical system of the eye stimulates cells of the retina.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的光学系统刺激视网膜内的细胞.

sentences.en: The periphery of the retina is very sensitive to motion.
sentences.cn: 视网膜的外围对运动非常敏感.

sentences.en: The retina , the inner layer of the globe, consists of two portions.
sentences.cn: 视网膜是眼球的内层, 包括两部分.

sentences.en: The retina is the sense reteshow in back part of the eye.
sentences.cn: 视网膜是处于眼球后部的感官组织.

sentences.en: There are correlations between rhe development of retina nerve and the vascularization.
sentences.cn: 视网膜神经和血管的发育过程存在相互联系.

sentences.en: There are sensory neurons, which take information from the world so as you see me, for instance, there are neurons firing from your retina sending signals to your brain.
sentences.cn: 感觉神经元,负责收集外界信息,比如,当你看到我的时候,视网膜上的神经元会产生神经冲动,将刺激信号传递到你的大脑

sentences.en: They predominate and are of greatest concentration in the central part of the retina.
sentences.cn: 它们在网膜中部占优势,具有最大的浓度.

sentences.en: This property is used in the treatment of a detached retina.
sentences.cn: 这种特性可用来治疗视网膜脱离.

sentences.en: Thus stimulation of one retina will normally invoke pupillary constriction in both eyes.
sentences.cn: 刺激一侧视网膜可引起双眼的瞳孔收缩.

trans.tran_en: the area at the back of your eye that receives light and sends an image of what you see to your brain
